description: Cheesecake is a much loved Ukrainian dessert and is traditionally made with cottage cheese. Cherries add a delicious sweetness to this simple cheesecake.
name: Ukrainian Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven 180Â°C. Beat the eggs, cottage cheese, 100g of sugar and vanilla in a large bowl with a handheld electric mixer.

In another bowl, rub the flour, remaining sugar and cubes of butter together until it resembles breadcrumbs. Line a deep rectangular baking tin with parchment paper and press the mixture into the base, smoothing with the back of a spoon.
Dot half of the cherries on the base, pour over the cheese mix and top with the rest of the cherries.
Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned and leave to cool for 30 minutes before chilling in the fridge for 1 hour. Slice and serve.
